name: Omelet
description: Go Greek, just don't smash the plate after!
ingredients: 1 Egg; 3/4 cup egg whites; 2 tbsp. feta; 2 cups spinach; 1/2 cup onions; 1/2 cup mushrooms; 1/2 cup skim milk; 1 slice whole-grain toast
instructions: 1. Lightly spray skillet with PAM and begin heating skillet at medium heat.; 2. Saute onions, mushrooms and spinach.; 3. Combine and whisk eggs, egg whites and feta. Pour into skillet when ready.; 4. Flip and remove omelet as desired, or at fluffy consistency.; 5. Serve with toast and a glass of skim milk.

name: Cereal Mix
ingredients: 1/4 cup All-Bran buds; 1/4 cup cereal of choice; 2 tbsp almond slivers; 1 banana; 1/2 cup berries; 1 cup skim milk
instructions: 1. Combine All-Bran buds, cereal of your choice, and almonds into bowl. Banana may be included chopped, or eaten on the side.; 2. Add milk, mix, and serve.

name: French Toast
description: You'll be "berry" surprised this one's healthy!
ingredients: 1 slice whole-grain toast; 2 eggs; 1 cup skim milk; 1 tsp. cinnamon; 1 cup berries; 1/2 cup peach slices
instructions: 1. Lightly spray skillet with PAM and begin heating skillet at medium heat.; 2. Combine and whisk eggs, 1/4 cup milk, and cinnamon.; 3. Dip bread into mixture, and place on skillet when ready. Flip when golden.; 4. Serve with berries and peaches on the side, and a glass of milk.

name: Morning Oats
ingredients: 3/4 cup plain oatmeal; 1 tsp. cinnamon; 3/4 cup yogurt (fat-free); 1/2 cup berries; 1 tbsp. nut butter; 1/2 cup skim milk
instructions: 1. Combine raw oats, cinnamon, berries, yogurt, and nut butter into a bowl, and mix.; 2. Serve with a cup of milk.

name: Smoothie Surprise
description: Go for a morning juice jolt!
ingredients: 3/4 cup plain yogurt (fat-free); 1/2 frozen banana; 3/4 cup frozen fruit; 1 tbsp nut butter; 1 cup spinach; 1/4 cup oats; 1/2 cup skim milk
instructions: 1. Combine all ingredients into a blender. Blend to desired consistency.

name: Turkey Wrap
description: Take your turkey with a sweet kick!
ingredients: 1 whole-grain wrap; 6 slices turkey breast; 1 cup lettuce, shredded; 4 chopped baby carrots; 1/2 cucumber, sticks; 1 tbsp. sweet/sour sauce; 15 grapes
instructions: 1. Lightly spread sweet/sour sauce on wrap.; 2. Neatly add ingredients into wrap and wrap.; 3. Serve with grapes.

name: Tuna Pita
ingredients: 1 whole-grain pita; 1 can light flaked tuna; 1 tbsp. light mayo; 2 tbsp. hummus; 1/2 cup cucumber slices; 1/2 cup kale, shredded; 1 tomato, sliced; 2 tbsp cheddar cheese, light; 1.5 cups melon, sliced
instructions: 1. Combine tuna and mayonnaise until evenly distributed.; 2. Line pita with hummus.; 3. Add Kale, tomatoes, cucumbers, tuna and cheese to pita and wrap.; 4. Serve with sliced melon.

name: Pizza Pockets
ingredients: 1 whole-grain English muffin; 2 slices swiss cheese, light; 1/2 cup tomato sauce; 75g chicken breast slivers; 1 cup grilled mushroom and zucchini; 1 banana
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F and line a baking pan with foil.; 2. Line English muffin halves with tomato sauce and place slices of Swiss cheese on top.; 3. Add toppings and bake for 10 minutes, or until golden brown.; 4. Serve with banana.

name: Legume Salad
ingredients: 3/4 cup chickpeas; 75g grilled x-firm tofu cubes; 50g crumbled feta, light; 2 cup chopped tomato, carrots, cucumber, celery; 1 tbsp. rice vinegar; 1 tbsp. oil; 8 whole-grain crackers
instructions: 1. Combine chickpeas, feta, and chopped vegetables into bowl.; 2. Grill tofu cubes until golden brown or as desired.; 3. Combine ingredients and add rice vinegar and olive (or vegetable) oil.; 4. Mix thoroughly and serve with crackers on the side.

name: Teriyaki Experience
description: Same great taste but save your coin for something else!
ingredients: 1/2 cup whole-grain rice; 12 shrimp; 2 cups broccoli, carrots, yellow peppers, snap peas; 1 tbsp oil; 2 tbsp teriyaki sauce; 1 cup skim milk
instructions: 1. Add 1 tbsp oil to wok or skillet and heat at medium-high heat.; 2. Cook shrimp and add vegetables when shrimp fully cooked. Cover and steam if desired.; 3. Add teriyaki sauce and lemon juice and mix thoroughly.; 4. Serve with rice and milk.

name: Taco Night
description: Make it Taco Tuesday any day of the week!
ingredients: 150g grilled chicken breast strips; 2 taco shells; 1 cup sautéed peppers/onions; 1/2 cup shredded romaine lettuce; 1 tbsp. sour cream, light; 1 tbsp shredded mozarella cheese, light; 2 tbsp mixed avocado and lemon juice
instructions: 1. Line taco shells with romaine lettuce.; 2. Add chicken breast and peppers/onions to taco shells.; 3. Serve topped with sour cream, mozarella cheese and avocado mixture as desired.

name: Tasty Meat Sauce
ingredients: 150g x-lean ground turkey with onions and garlic; 1 cup chopped zucchini, peppers, carrots, kale, garlic; 1 cup canned crushed tomatoes; 2 tbsp tomato paste; 1/2 cup whole-grain pasta; 2 tbsp. parmesan cheese, light.
instructions: 1. Lightly oil/spray skillet or saucepan with 1 tsp vegetable oil.; 2. Cook ground turkey with onions and garlic.; 3. Add chopped vegetables, crushed tomatoes, and tomato pasted when turkey cooked.; 4. Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with pasta.

name: The Original Goods
ingredients: 75g Steak; 15 steamed asaparagus with  lemon juice; 1/2 cup mashed potato; 1 cup mashed cauliflower; 25g cheddar cheese, light; 1 tbsp. oil; 1 garlic clove, chopped
instructions: 1. Lightly oil/spray skillet with 1 tsp vegetable oil.; 2. Cook steak as desired.; 3. Chop potatoes and cauliflower into small cubes and boil until softened. Drain water when everything softened, and then add oil, cheese, garlic and salt - mash untile desired consistency.; 4. Serve with steamed asparagus and mashed “potatoes.”

name: Three-layered Sheppard's Pie
ingredients: 100g x-lean ground turkey; 1/2 cup mashed butternut squash; 1/2 cup mashed sweet potato; 2 cups onions, garlic, zucchini, peppers, carrots, celery; cheddar cheese, light; 1 cup Garden salad; 1.5 tbsp salad dressing
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F.; 2. Thoroughly cook ground turkey, onions, garlic, zucchini, peppers, carrots and celery.; 3. Line the bottom of a bake-safe container with mashed butternut squash.; 4. Layer ground turkey mixture on top of mashed butternut squash.; 5.Layer mashed sweet potato over ground turkey mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top.; 6. Cook for 30 minutes or until golden brown. Serve with garden salad.

name: Stir-Fry it up!
description: Fry it, stir it, eat it.
ingredients: 75g grilled x-firm tofu cubes; 6 shrimp; 75g chicken; 1 cup bok choy, snow peas, slivered carrots, bean sprouts; 1/2 cup whole-grain rice; 1/2 cup shredded cauliflower; 2 tbsp. light teriyaki sauce; 1 tbsp. peanut sauce; 1 tbsp lemon or lime juice; 3/4 cup plain yogurt (fat-free)
instructions: 1. Combine sauce in a small bowl. 2. Lightly oil skillet/wok with 1 tsp vegetable oil.; 3. Thoroughly cook tofu, shrimp and chicken. Add vegetables when ready.; 4. Add sauce and mix thoroughly. Serve with rice/cauliflower mixture, and yogurt on the side.

name: Fruity Parfait
ingredients: 3/4 cup yogurt (fat-free); 1/2 cup berries; 1 tsp. cinnamon
instructions: 1. Layer yogurt and fruit until ingredients are all used up.; 2. Top with cinnamon for extra flavour.

name: Cheesy crackers
ingredients: 4 whole-grain crackers; 2 tbsp cream cheese, light; 6 slices cucumber
instructions: 1. Spread cream cheese on top of crackers.; 2. Top crackers with cucumber slices.

name: Veggies & dip
ingredients: 2 tbsp. hummus; 2 cups raw vegetable sticks
instructions: 1. Chop vegetables into sticks, and dip into hummus for flavour.

name: Munchies
description: Pop it up and pop it in!
ingredients: 1 cups air-popped popcorn; 1 tbsp soy nuts
instructions: 1. Pop popcorn in microwave or stove top.; 2. Sprinkle soy nuts over popped popcorn.

name: Fresh crunch
description: How many apple slices can you get in a cracker sandwich?
ingredients: 4 whole grain crackers; 1/2 can tuna; 1 tsp. light mayo; 8 grapes, halved
instructions: 1. Mix tuna and mayo together in a bowl.; 2. Spread tuna mix over crackers.; 3. Slice grapes in half, and top crackers with grapes.
